body_html: @jspark1105 It is mainly because of engineering priorities AFAIK. I didn't find any particular reason why BDW would benefit less than SKX w.r.t. int8 performance gain over fp32. But we might have to evaluate the performance gain first. Is BDW int8 support as important as SKX?
body_text: @jspark1105 It is mainly because of engineering priorities AFAIK. I didn't find any particular reason why BDW would benefit less than SKX w.r.t. int8 performance gain over fp32. But we might have to evaluate the performance gain first. Is BDW int8 support as important as SKX?
body: @jspark1105 It is mainly because of engineering priorities AFAIK. I didn't find any particular reason why BDW would benefit less than SKX w.r.t. int8 performance gain over fp32. But we might have to evaluate the performance gain first. Is BDW int8 support as important as SKX?
